Class RTMPTHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.server.net.rtmp.BaseRTMPHandler

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRTMPHandler, Constants, StatusCodes, Aware, ApplicationContextAware

    public class RTMPTHandler
extends RTMPHandler
    Handler for RTMPT messages.
    Author:
    The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Joachim Bauch (jojo@struktur.de), Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
